rooms.description:
First Room. The only direction forward is to the north.
Use this data file to test robustness if data specifies a missing item or element.
Your program should handle it gracefully.
This second 'room' is part of the hallway. The rooms in this file are empty. Use this as a simple test case to ensure you can 'walk around'. Keep going North.
Just another room. This is the end of the line. Go south to return to your starting point.
